pages.text: The Oxygen Distributor creates a breathable bubble of oxygen in airless environments. It uses advanced flood-fill technology to detect enclosed spaces and fill them with oxygen.

pages.title: Setup
pages.text: 1. Supply oxygen (via Mekanism chemical system)$(br)2. Provide power (FE/RF)$(br)3. The distributor will fill the area around it$(br)$(br)4. Use "Show Oxygen" button in GUI to see oxygen blocks.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: 1. Scans the surrounding area for enclosed spaces$(br)2. Detects walls, floors, and ceilings$(br)3. Fills area with oxygen blocks$(br)4. Maintains oxygen levels as long as powered

pages.title: Mekanism Integration
pages.text: Oxygen Distributors use Mekanism's oxygen chemical:$(br)$(br)- Connect oxygen pipes to the distributor$(br)- Use Mekanism's chemical tanks$(br)- Electrolytic Separators produce oxygen$(br)$(br)This provides realistic oxygen generation and distribution.
